notes: The FILE_MAPPING initialization parameter is deprecated. It is still supported for backward compatibility.
section:
Note:

The FILE_MAPPING initialization parameter is deprecated. It is still supported for backward compatibility.

FILE_MAPPING specifies whether file mapping is enabled. The FMON background process is started to manage the mapping information when file mapping is enabled.

See Also:

Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about the file mapping feature
seealso: Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about the file mapping feature
